mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_tbl (member_id, member_pwd, member_name, member_tel, member_email, member_birth, member_sex, member_address, member_point, member_step, member_cumPoint, member_reg_date) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_name}, #{member_tel}, #{member_email}, #{member_birth}, #{member_sex}, #{member_address}, #{member_point}, #{member_step}, #{member_cumPoint}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT faq_index, faq_title, faq_sub_title, faq_content, rownum num FROM faq_tbl) WHERE num >= #{start} AND num <= #{end}
